title: National Geographic Photo of the Day

articles.title: Las Pozas, Mexico
articles.description: This Month in Photo of the Day: Nature and Weather Photos When a freak freeze killed the orchid collection on his Mexican estate, English eccentric Edward James created Las Pozas, a garden with surreal follies like the concrete Bamboo Palace—durable and immune to the vagaries of weather. See more pictures from the March 2013 feature story "Night Gardens."  Watch a time-lapse sequence of a night-blooming water lily »   Go behind the scenes in a Q&A with Diane Cook and Len Jenshel »

articles.title: Butterfly and Rhododendron
articles.description: This Month in Photo of the Day: Nature and Weather Photos This beautiful rare butterfly was on a rhododendron bush in my grandfather's garden, Dartmoor, Devon.  (This photo and caption were submitted to My Shot.)   Download butterfly wallpapers »  Get macro photo tips »

articles.title: Elephants, Tanzania
articles.description: This Month in Photo of the Day: Nature and Weather Photos After spending two weeks building a windmill in Tanzania, I get a chance to sit back and enjoy the scenery. This big guy seems just as interested in me as I am in him. (This photo and caption were submitted to Your Shot.)   Learn about the illegal ivory trade »  Browse animal photo galleries »   See pictures of savannas and grasslands »

articles.title: Millennium Park, Chicago
articles.description: This Month in Photo of the Day: Nature and Weather Photos Kids playing or "praying" under the water towers in the Millennium Park in Chicago  (This photo and caption were submitted to Your Shot.)   Get tips on photographing people »  See pictures of Chicago's green features »

articles.title: Lightning, New Mexico
articles.description: This Month in Photo of the Day: Nature and Weather Photos A ground fire ignited by a lightning storm near Elephant Butte, New Mexico, paints the horizon with brown smoke. At right, another cloud-to-ground strike flashes through a shaft of rain. See more pictures from the August 2012 feature story "Chasing Lightning."   See pictures of extreme weather »  Get tips on photographing weather »   Watch the birth of a lightning bolt »

articles.title: Zebras, Serengeti
articles.description: This Month in Photo of the Day: Nature and Weather Photos Image taken in the Serengeti in Tanzania during the migration period. Zebras and wildebeest were gathering on the edge of the river, waiting for the right moment to cross. (This photo and caption were submitted to My Shot.)   Learn why zebras are born to run »  See a 360° panorama of zebras »   See pictures of savannas and grasslands »
